pageDescription: The Gents Section has a full playing membership of around 80 who compete in our internal competitions which are run throughout the year. We also have teams who represent the club in the Paisley and District Bowling Association (P&DBA) league and cup competitions, Paisley Veterans Bowling Association (PVBA), as well as the competitions run by the Renfrewshire Bowling Association (RBA) and Bowls Scotland. In addition to the Association competitions we have a full itinerary of domestic competitions and events which are listed below.
